extendedInfo.description: Stickman Tennis is a fast paced realistic tennis game on spectacular courts and an astonishing atmosphere, simple controls and tons of replay value. Play top spins, slices, lobs and smashes, play cross, longline or inside-out and choose between automatic and manual running. The revolutionary time machine will let you replay a point you lost, to give you a second chance. Play a quick game or complete tour season of Tennis against 100 different opponents. Collect trophies and improve your world rank in a complete season with 64 tournaments. Train your shots on the training court with ball machine. Features â¢ Play a quick game or complete tour season â¢ Simple yet powerful touch controls with timing control â¢ Automatic running or manual running â¢ Play top spins, slices and lobs, cross, longline, inside-out, etc. â¢ Choose between short sets, full sets or last short set â¢ Revolutionary time machine: replay last point you lost â¢ Training court with ball machine â¢ Top 100 world rank opponents with individual profiles and strength â¢ 64 different tournaments with 5 difficulty levels and different amount of rounds to play â¢ 10 Different courts: hard courts, clay, grass â¢ 3 difficulty levels for longterm motivation: easy, medium, hard â¢ Match statistics â¢ Collect trophies and improve your world rank â¢ Resume of matches always possible â¢ Addictive gameplay Take a look at the Stickman Tennis Trailer : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Q1o9gpZfVkFeel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This game is brilliant, has great features, I can\'t complain at all, is better than stick tennis due to the fact that all of this game is free with great game modes rather than paying, don\'t mind the pop ups at all :)
reviews.author: Nathan Higginbottom

reviews.title: Can\'t play!!!
reviews.comment: When I try to play this game, as soon as I press \"play game\" it just freezes and force quits itself and I can\'t play at all. Please fix! I have a Samsung galaxy ace.
reviews.author: Jackson Yoon

reviews.title: Ehh
reviews.comment: Not as fun as i thought you cant do teams or online games add that ill do five stars
reviews.author: Lawrence Smith

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Runs really slow on samsung galaxy s3, really shouldn\'t. Can\'t play
reviews.author: Ryan Petten

reviews.title: Nyc game
reviews.comment: Gives a live gaming experience. .the idea of using neutral players is vry good
reviews.author: Jatin Arora

reviews.title: Best tennis game but still needs work
reviews.comment: This is the best tennis game on the play store. It\'s too laggy and Choppy but still good. Very Mario tennis-esque
reviews.author: Erik Johnson

reviews.title: Now what?
reviews.comment: Finished all the levels... Now what? Uninstall? Can\'t do anything else in the game.   World ranking never worked for me.   But it\'s a fun game while you can play it.
reviews.author: Alejandro GP

reviews.title: Bad Performance on S3 +Ads
reviews.comment: After Update Game are very slow and comming Fullscreen-Stupid-Ads after Start and Pause. Small Ads are ok, but Fullscreen are no-go! deleted App from phone
reviews.author: Dany Stastka

reviews.title: Favourite Game
reviews.comment: This is without a doubt my favourite game available on my S2 and other phones. Right ammount of difficulty and enjoyment.
reviews.author: Martin Corner

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So addicting and a great game overall! You shouldnt pick the game up if you have something to do! :)
reviews.author: Carla King

reviews.title: Good but needs more Pizzaz
reviews.comment: Needs a new HD Sequel but other than that is a Great Game!!
reviews.author: Jonathan Kongolo

reviews.title: Gs3
reviews.comment: It freezes and force quits as soon as I try to hit play game
reviews.author: Christian Miller

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: Way too slow and where is the fun in not being able to move your player, dumb, and 33 MB\'s, for what?, come on, totally unrealistic
reviews.author: Shane Adams

reviews.title: Something Wrong..??!!
reviews.comment: \"File package invalid\"??   What is wrong?  Disappointed. Looked like a great app.
reviews.author: surjasama lahiri

reviews.title: Really good game
reviews.comment: I like this game the stick man games are fun games do far
reviews.author: Lionel Ingram

reviews.title: Suprisingly really good
reviews.comment: Really good game. Simple controls. Great fun and can be a great pass time and a challenge to get no 1. Love the fact the names are all slightly off, prob due to copyright or whatever. And it\'s free. Definitely must
reviews.author: Thomas Riches

reviews.title: Best of the best!!!
reviews.comment: A very simple game to manage but with great graphics and amazing shot selection. You have slice, hard flat shot, lobs, volley, overhead smash, long or short shots... Highly recommended!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Jose Rodriguez

reviews.title: this is ok
reviews.comment: bad quality of game lags a lot and adverts always come up and another thing is you could add challenges but yeah good idea
reviews.author: James Ritchie

reviews.title: Sssssssllllllllllooooooooooowwwwww.
reviews.comment: I thought everything was fixed? The game still plays like its in slow motion. U still dont have a full explanation on what the letters mean. Also give us the option to get rid of the ads.
reviews.author: Tom Hogan

reviews.title: Ridiculously bad
reviews.comment: I have no idea how this got 4 stars. REALLY slow and laggy, controls are rubbish. Stupid adverts in game give MEGA lag depending on the advert displayed. Terrible
reviews.author: Chris Bowen
